Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.manager

Interface ManagerContextService

All Superinterfaces:
Description, javax.servlet.ServletContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
Context
public interface ManagerContextService extends javax.servlet.ServletContext, Description
Remote interface to manage a web application context.
Author:
Chris Burdess
